name: hubzilla
description: Hubzilla is a decentralized social networking platform that supports forums, file sharing, webpages and chat. It uses the Zot protocol for identity nomadicity and privacy, and can federate with other social platforms.

features.title: Decentralized Platform
features.description: Run your own social network node that federates with other Hubzilla instances

features.title: Nomadic Identity
features.description: Move your identity between servers without losing connections or content

features.title: Multiple Features
features.description: Combine social networking, forums, file sharing, and webpages in one platform

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Advanced federation protocol with strong privacy and identity features

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Granular permissions for posts, files, and pages with flexible privacy settings

features.title: Cloud Storage
features.description: Built-in file storage with WebDAV support for easy file management

features.title: Cms Capabilities
features.description: Create and publish web pages and wikis alongside social content

features.title: Activitypub Support
features.description: Federate with Mastodon, Pleroma, and other ActivityPub networks
